Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer:
Liker Land offers a transparent, affordable, and inclusive platform to access and distribute stories and knowledge. It connects readers and authors through a fair, fast, and open system. 

#### Sales
Books are available not only on the Liker Land main site but also through a variety of channels, including online stores, individuals, online media, social media, physical bookstores, and NFT marketplaces like OpenSea. All sales channels earn a share of the profits.

#### Payments
Readers can pay with cryptocurrency or credit cards, while authors can choose to receive payments in crypto or fiat currency. Unlike traditional paper books, which are settled every six months, e-books on Liker Land are settled monthly. Additionally, Liker Land offers real-time profit sharing and daily settlements. Authors retain up to 90% of sales and receive instant payouts.

#### Storage
E-book files on Liker Land are stored using decentralized technology, eliminating single points of failure and protecting against censorship.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
### Features

#### Blockchain-Registered E-books
- Include unique features like author signatures, personalized messages, and serial numbers.
- Can be resold second-hand, with authors and publishers continuing to earn a share of the profits.

#### AI-Assisted Reader
- Text-to-Speech (TTS) functionality.
- One-click translation.
- AI-powered summarization.

#### Community-Driven
- Community-curated book lists.
- Open bookshelves: an “Instagram of books” experience.
- Listed over 400+ high quality ebooks from across 300+ local publishers and independent authors from HK, Taiwan and China
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer:
Migrating to OP from Cosmso in Q2 to a more scalable ecosystem.

Building out the basic AI reader in Q3 as a new product line.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Liker Land - decentralized ebookstore
project.description:
Liker Land is a decentralized ebookstore leveraging blockchain and AI to empower readers, authors, and local bookstores. 

It offers a transparent platform where books are sold across multiple channels—online stores, social media, physical bookstores, and NFT marketplaces like Opensea—with profits shared among channels and contributors. 

Readers can pay with crypto or credit cards, while authors earn up to 90% of sales with real-time settlements. 

Community curation and decentralized storage ensure inclusivity and resilience, while features like blockchain-registered ebooks, AI-assisted reading tools, and open bookshelves redefine the reading experience. 

Liker Land democratizes publishing by amplifying new voices, supporting bookstores, and giving readers true ownership of their ebooks.
